msbt.message: Mom told me once how Dad and his jazz quartet would play these fab New Year's Eve gigsEverybody would be up all night, partying, dancing, playing musicMom and Dad would slip away from the partyand they'd walk down to the beachwhere they'd stand and hold hands, watching the first sunrise of the new year.

Did you know that what you see in your first dream of the new year can tell you what your year will be like?'K, so, if you dream about money, you'll get rich. A sandwich dream? There's good food coming your way.My first dream last year was about a, umreally menacingjar of pickle slices.It was a really weird year.

It's New Year's Day, bestie! It's a good time to remember what's important.And what's important to meis you!<10_4 /> Because you're on my "in case of emergency, please call" list.If a hospital, or, um, a lawyer calls, don't send them to voicemail, 'K?

I want to start a new tradition for New Year's Day! Want to help?I need three 10,000-watt lasers.<10_4 /> And a million pounds of glitter.I figure we've got a whole year to source those things, right? New tradition, here we come!

HAPPY NEW YEAR! I WANTED A NEW TRADITION FOR NEW YEAR'S! SO I DID A THING!I DRANK ALL THE COFFEE! I'M NOT KIDDING! EVERY DROP ON THE WHOLE ISLAND!I DRANK ALL OF MINE! THEN I WENT DOOR TO DOOR, AND THEN I DRANK EVERYBODY ELSE'S!AND IT'S WORKING!THIS IS THE CALMEST! I HAVE EVER BEEN!HAPPY NEW YEAR EVERYONE!
